name: Haruno Sakura (Naruto) LoRA
description:
Haruno Sakura (Naruto - all series) LoRA

Making models can be expensive. Do you like what I do? Consider supporting me on Patreon 🅿️ or feel free to buy me a coffee ☕

There was already a LoRA for this, but people still requested it. I've asked Satyam (the author of the first Sakura LoRA) if that's fine for me to post this. If he somehow decided that it's not cool I'll simply remove it.

Back to the LoRA, this can do all versions of Sakura, from her child version with long hair, to her Boruto adult version. It can also control her forehead mark by simply adding forehead mark to the prompt (yep, the one in the example is not inpainted). To control her version you can use descriptive tags + the tags of the series she's from (see the examples). I suggest around 0.6 weight and triggers with haruno sakura. You can also have her wear any outfit you can think of simply changing the prompts. Examples made with AnyPastel and AbyssOrangeMix2. One is using my Sam Yang LoRA.

How to use LoRA's in auto1111:

  • Update webui (use git pull like here or redownload it)

  • Copy the file to stable-diffusion-webui/models/lora

  • Select your LoRA like in this video

  • Make sure to change the weight (by default it's :1 which is usually too high)
